title: TK Maxx Black Friday 2019 deals revealed
text:

TK Maxx is set to launch Black Friday deals starting this month.

The high street retailer has announced plans to roll out new deals from 20 October until the big day on 29 November, giving shoppers plenty of time to scoop up the biggest bargains.

The discounts will be available to shop in store and online at tkmaxx.com, with new categories and branded products on sale each week.

Hundreds of new items will be featured in the price cuts of the specially curated weekly flash sales of TK Maxx's best stock.

Shoppers will need to jump on the discounts fast as once the deals are gone, they won't be restocked.

Here is a full breakdown of all the forthcoming promotions:

20 October – Shoes galore

Shoppers can find discounts on a range of footwear including party heels, branded trainers and on trend high street staples.

Big brand heel steals, on-trend trainers, and high street favourites to kick start the new year in style.

27 October – Kid’s Idols

The perfect opportunity to stock up on everything your kids will need for the festive season, including Disney and superhero themed clothing, toys and accessories.

3 November – Branded Homeware

Revamp your home for holiday season with price cuts of up to 60% off branded homeware, glassware and kitchen gadgets.

10 November – Menswear

Go on the hunt for designer menswear and international labels - perfect for picking up a bargain gift for Christmas for all the men (and boys) in your life.

17 November – Bagtopia

If you're after some serious arm candy ahead of Christmas, the chain will be slashing the price of designer handbags, backpacks and clutches.

Last year the chain offered a similar Black Friday promotion, shunning the traditional one-day promotion in favour of a month-long period of price cuts across several departments.

Speaking last year about the change in tack, Deborah Dolce, Group Brand and Marketing Director at TK Maxx said: “Our whole concept means that we ‘do’ Black Friday 365 days a year."

Dolce added: "We will have a full month of fantastic products coming in to store and online every day featuring our favourite designers from around the world. "
description: TK Maxx are giving UK shoppers early access to Black Friday deals starting at the end of the month. Here is what you can expect
